definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Also, screens nearly always have a bevelled edge.
sentences.chinese: 此外，屏幕几乎总是有一个斜面的边缘。

sentences.english: The interaction between ice sheet and sloping structure is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了冰排与斜面结构的相互作用过程。

sentences.english: Use the image below for the values of the Bevel and Emboss .
sentences.chinese: 用这个底层的图片为斜面与浮雕设置值。

sentences.english: If the inclined angle is smaller, the tool will be sharper.
sentences.chinese: 哪果倾斜面越小，工具就会越锋利。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a wind hole inclined surface connection structure of a cooker hood.
sentences.chinese: 本发明是涉及吸油烟机风孔斜面连接结构。

sentences.english: The ramp sits at an acute angle to deflect the intake airstream from the longitudinal direction.
sentences.chinese: 这个斜面锐角使进气口的气流纵向流变。

sentences.english: This is that slope, here is that object.
The period-doubling and chaotic gaits of passive dynamic walking have been analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 得到了斜面倾角增大时样机的倍周期步态。

sentences.english: Play that funky music, white boy I cant hear you, say it.
sentences.chinese: 音乐起，胆源性白斜面男孩我听到你说。

sentences.english: The long frame bar and the short frame bar adopt the mutual complementary angle slope butt-joint.
sentences.chinese: 所述的长框架条与短框架条采用互为余角的斜面对接。

sentences.english: You can see the Bevel settings below.
sentences.chinese: 你可以看到下面的斜面参数。

sentences.english: It is all high polish with beveled edges and has black carbon fiber inlay.
sentences.chinese: 这是所有的高抛光与斜面边缘，黑色碳纤维嵌体。

sentences.english: Cluster bevels are excellent for creating glass art.
sentences.chinese: 集群斜面是创造优良的玻璃艺术。

sentences.english: To meet in a miter joint.
There is no slope or angle to the croup.
sentences.chinese: 在臀部没有有斜面和角度。

sentences.english: Add Bevel and Emboss and Gradient Overlay.
sentences.chinese: 添加斜面和浮雕和渐变叠加。

definition: dip/angle of dip (inclination of a geological plane down from horizontal)/tilt (inclination of ship from vertical)
vertical/to erect/to set upright/vertical stroke in Chinese characters/young servant (old)
